game.beginning: In a world where magic has disappeared, the land is plagued by a terrible curse that causes all living things to slowly turn to stone.
game.ending: With the help of a group of allies and ancient artifacts, the protagonist manages to defeat the dark sorcerer responsible for the curse and restore magic to the world.
game.synopsis: In a desperate bid to save their world from destruction, the last remnants of humanity must band together with other magical creatures to find a way to break the curse before it's too late.
game.title: The Lost Magic of Eldrador
